name: AI Project
prompt: Create an ultra-modern, high-quality landing page for DarkByte, a premium hosting service offering Minecraft servers, VPS hosting, and game server hosting.  The landing page should be:  Visually striking with a gaming aesthetic — vibrant gradients, glowing accents, futuristic fonts, and subtle animations.  Responsive and mobile-friendly, with smooth scrolling and interactive hover effects.  Include a hero section with a bold headline, a tagline highlighting performance and reliability, and clear call-to-action buttons.  Include a features section showcasing Minecraft, VPS, and game server hosting, with visually distinct cards and icons.  Include a pricing section with 3–4 attractive plans, highlighting key specs (RAM, CPU, storage) and call-to-action buttons.  Include a testimonials or reviews section with modern card designs.  Include a footer with social links, contact info, and branding.  Use futuristic and gaming-themed typography, vibrant neon colors, subtle glowing and gradient effects, and a dark, immersive background.  The overall feel should be premium, high-performance, and gamer-friendly, appealing to both Minecraft and general game server audiences.
